{"id":995967135,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1689520606,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"14 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/995967135/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"6.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        string subs = \"\";\n        int max = 0;\n        for(char c : s){\n            size_t pos = subs.find(c);\n            if(pos != string::npos){\n                if(max < subs.size())\n                    max = subs.size();\n\n                subs.erase(0,pos+1);            \n            }\n            subs+=c;\n        }\n\n        return subs.size() > max ? subs.size() : max ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
